name: 黃昭勳
objective:
1.Biaxial Bending of Columns
2.Long Column Effects
3.Two-way Slabs – Direct Design Method
4.Resisting Frames
5.Shear Walls
schedule:
0-2 Biaxial Bending of Columns
3 Long Column Effects
4-9 Two-way Slabs – Direct Design Method
10. Midterm
11-17-Moment Resisting Frames
18 Final
materials:
1.ACI Committee 318, “Building Code Requirements for Structural Concrete (ACI 318-05) and Commentary (ACI 318r-05) ,” American Concrete Institute, Farmington Hills, MI, 2005.
2.James G. MacGregor and James K. Wright, “Reinforced Concrete – Mechanics and Design,” 4th Ed., Prentice Hall, 2005.
3.Paulay and Priestley, “Seismic Design of Reinforce Concrete and Masonry Buildings,” Wiley, 1992.
4.Other undergraduate RC textbook(s).
